title: Add an option to treat MSB3277 (Found conflicts between different versions...) as an error
body: VS/Nuget sometimes add duplicated entries in app.config which will lead to runtime errors while loading assemblies. Oftentimes it requires hitting specific codepath and having an option to treat this error as warning at build time would really benefit and save time.

nodes.body: Team triage: This makes sense as a new, opt-in behavior. Marking up-for-grabs--if you'd like to contribute a fix, please let us know.
